errors.name: InvalidPrincipalAmount
errors.msg: This amount is not sufficient as a principal amount.

errors.name: InvalidInterestAmount
errors.msg: This amount is not sufficient as an interest amount.

errors.name: DealNotLive
errors.msg: This deal is not live yet.

errors.name: UnauthorizedSigner
errors.msg: The Signer is not authorized to use this instruction.

errors.name: CredixPassInvalid
errors.msg: Credix pass is invalid for this request.

errors.name: CredixPassInactive
errors.msg: Credix pass is inactive at the moment.

errors.name: ZeroDenominator
errors.msg: Invalid Ratio: denominator can't be zero.

errors.name: InvalidPreciseNumber
errors.msg: Invalid u64 used as value for PreciseNumber.

errors.name: PreciseNumberCastFailed
errors.msg: Unable to cast PreciseNumber to u64

errors.name: MarketIsFrozen
errors.msg: This market is currently frozen. Please try again later.

errors.name: InvalidTreasuryAccount
errors.msg: Invalid treasury Account for this market.

errors.name: WithdrawalsLocked
errors.msg: Not yet possible to withdraw funds.

errors.name: TotalTrancheSizeNotOne
errors.msg: Total tranche size should be one.

errors.name: TotalTrancheReturnsNotOne
errors.msg: Total tranche returns should be one.

errors.name: InvalidTrancheSizeOrReturns
errors.msg: A tranche with a size should have a value for its returns and vice versa.

errors.name: InvalidTrancheIndex
errors.msg: There is no tranche in the deal with the provided index.

errors.name: DealNotOpen
errors.msg: This deal is not open for funding yet.

errors.name: TranchePassInactive
errors.msg: Tranche pass is inactive at the moment.

errors.name: InvalidInstructionDepositTranche
errors.msg: Deposit Tranche instruction doesn't exist for senior tranche(index=1).

errors.name: RepaymentPeriodsPrincipalValuesInvalid
errors.msg: Total sum of all the principal should be equal to the total principal of the deal.

errors.name: DealNotOpenForActivation
errors.msg: A deal can only be activated once all tranches(except for the senior tranche at index 1) have been filled.

errors.name: DealNotOpenForBurningTranches
errors.msg: Deal not open for burning tranches

errors.name: InvalidSeniorTrancheInstruction
errors.msg: This instructuion is invalid for senior tranche.

errors.name: LastRepaymentInvalid
errors.msg: Last repayment in the repayment schedule should have some value for principal or interest

errors.name: DealTrancheWithdrawalClosed
errors.msg: Deal not open for tranche withdrawal

errors.name: WrongAmountTrancheConfigs
errors.msg: Wrong number of tranche configs: expected 10
